thread.title: GM says South Korean arm may file for bankruptcy

title: GM says South Korean arm may file for bankruptcy
text:
GM says South Korean arm may file for bankruptcy 1:49pm BST - 01:08 
General Motors says its loss-making South Korean arm may file for bankruptcy if the union representing local workers doesn't agree to cutting labor costs by April 20. The statement puts pressure on both striking workers and the South Korean government to agree to a proposed company restrcuture. Ed Giles reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
General Motors says its loss-making South Korean arm may file for bankruptcy if the union representing local workers doesn't agree to cutting labor costs by April 20. The statement puts pressure on both striking workers and the South Korean government to agree to a proposed company restrcuture. Ed Giles reports.
